channel.title: | Conquest #317 | Online 24/7 | D&D | Quests |
channel.description:
[center][img]http://conquest-317.com/images/conquest317.gif[/img][/center]
Welp, not much to say here we like to let our content sell the server to you guys, we really strive to be unique in all the things we implement in the server, so you will see a lot of custom quests, objectives, item creating, and skilling methods.
[SIZE=3][U][B]Features:[/B][/U][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Combat Training: ClickBased Training Till Level 60; Afterwards move towards -> Slayer or -> Summoning! [*]Newer Revision Items (Claws, Torva, Etc.)! [*]Gambling! [*]8GB Dedicated VPS! [*]Many Shops (all items obtainable by normal players, we don't like to make some items only accessible to a certain group ex: donators). [*]Custom Combat-Based Summoning System! [*]New Smithing System for Trimming Armour! [*]Slayer System based on multiple bosses throughout RuneScape! [*]All Skills Trainable! [*]Creation of Armour Set(s) for selling. (I.E Full Rune -> Rune Set (lg)) [*]All skills have a good yield of gold, which we like to encourage! [*]Animated Boss NPCs with Multiple Combat Styles! [*]Custom Perks, Like Greed which when used grants the chance of a double RARE loot). [*]Custom Scrolls, which when used; can give the player a set number of different points in the game (PK Points, PvM Points, Safe-PK Points, etc.)! [*]Both Dangerous and Safe-PKing for lovers of both! [*]Skilling Task based area, where when assigned a task you will be required to gather all the resources, these resources cannot be obtained elsewhere and cannot be obtained unless assigned. [*]Distractions & Diversions: Penguins spawn EVERYWHERE, when online you could randomly be warned of a Penguin hiding somewhere first one to him gets some great rewards! [*]We have a on-going list of quests being added, we currently have 4 quests, each yielding new areas, bosses, or rewards! [*]Mature Community, very helpful for newbies getting started.[/ul]
[center] [b][SIZE=5][U]Ways to play:[/U][/SIZE][/b] [url=http://www.conquest-317.com/webclient/client.jar][img]http://www.zarvality.com/toplists/play.gif[/img]Downloadable Client[/url] [url=http://www.conquest-317.com/webclient/][img]http://www.zarvality.com/toplists/play.gif[/img]Web Client[/url] [url=http://www.conquest-317.com/forums/][img]http://www.zarvality.com/toplists/play.gif[/img]Forums[/url][/center]
Server is now running: Double XP Weekend!
[SPOILER=Skilling Point Area]Recently a new area has been added, this area requires ATLEAST 80 Woodcutting, Smithing, Mining, Cooking, Fishing, or RuneCrafting. There is currently 18 different tasks you can get requiring the gathering of either Armor, Rocks, Wood, Fish, and Runes. We plan to release many more different types of Tasks as the base we set it up with easy allows new ones to be implemented.
[img]http://puu.sh/7UX6X.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UX8C.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UXbD.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UXcE.jpg[/img]
Related Video: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f5g0Mfeb5zU]Conquest-317 Null Skill Points - YouTube[/url] [/spoiler]
[SPOILER=Summoning] Bosses Fightable in Summoning:
[ul][*]Dagannoth Supreme [*]Agrith Na-Na [*]Barrelchest [*]King Black Dragon [*]Kalphite Queen [*]Gen. Graandor [*]K'ril T (Zamorak GWD Boss) [*]Commander Zilyana [*]Kree'ara [*]Jad [*]Nomad [*]Sea Queen [*]Tormented Demon [*]Frost Dragon [*]Corporeal Beast [*]Balance-Elemental [*]The Inadequacy [*]Avatar of Creation (requires 99 Slayer) [*]Avatar of Destruction (requires 99 Slayer)[/ul]
[b]Summoning is trained using the Summoning teleport (found in your spellbook) and then clicking your Summoning tab and spawning your first Boss, once you kill the boss you will get his drops and XP towards Summoning. XP gets higher as you start fighting new and stronger Bosses.[/b]
[img]http://puu.sh/7UXAT.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UXDP.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UXFW.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UXLa.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UXOS.jpg[/img]
Related Video: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jGtp4QKZcP4]Conquest-317 Null Summoning - YouTube[/url] [/spoiler]
[SPOILER=Slayer] Bosses fightable in Slayer:
[ul][*]Irvig Senay [*]San Tojalon [*]Ice Queen [*]Black Knight Titan [*]Giant Mole [*]Flamebead [*]Bork [*]Nezikchened [*]Jungle Demon [*]Ice Strykewyrm [*]Jungle Strykewyrm [*]Desert Strykewyrm [*]Bandos Avatar [*]Skeletal Horror [*]Avatar of Creation (requires 99 Summoning) [*]Avatar of Destruction (requires 99 Summoning)[/ul]
[b]Recently introduced was our Slayer system, this task based system assigns you many different RuneScape bosses, once killed you gain Slayer XP, the monster's drop, and Slayer Store Points (as shown above). This is the other main money maker in the server (bested by Summoning).[/b]
[img]http://puu.sh/7UY4D.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UYag.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UYaX.jpg[/img]
Related Video: Coming Soon! [/spoiler]
[SPOILER=Safe PKing and PVP] We have different ways of encouraging and discouraging Risk-PVP, on one end we have a Revnants teleport which is in deep wild, but they are the only known NPC to drop non-degraded PVP armor(s), weapon(s), and PvP Artifacts.
[img]http://puu.sh/7UYmc.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UYqV.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UYuQ.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UZfT.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UZi6.jpg[/img]
Related Video: None [/spoiler]
[SPOILER=Bossing (other).] Now you may be asking, with Summoning and Slayer including most of the Bosses in RuneScape are there any team-based bosses or bosses that don't require a skill to fight? Yes, we have quite a few actually. In fact, a new boss is in development now for release for Easter, if you join the server you just might catch the event in time.
[img]http://puu.sh/7UYKM.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UYQy.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UYTJ.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UZ5C.jpg[/img]
Related Video: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LOY7dSTmBaY]Conquest-317 Null Bossing - YouTube[/url] [/spoiler]
[SPOILER=Skilling] [img]http://puu.sh/7UZBe.jpg[/img]
[b]All of our Skilling is done in one area (excluding the Skilling POINTS Area). Here you can train all skills, in some way, shape, or form.[/b]
[B][SIZE=4]Thieving:[/SIZE][/B] [img]http://puu.sh/7UZFz.jpg[/img]
[B][SIZE=4]Smithing:[/SIZE][/B] [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/smith.png[/img] [table] [tr][td] [th]Level[/th] [th]Item[/th] [th]XP[/th] [/td][/tr] [tr] [td]1[/td] [td]Studded (t), Wizzy (t)[/td] [td]150[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]10[/td] [td]Black (t)[/td] [td]200[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]25[/td] [td]Adamant (t), Green D'hide (t)[/td] [td]275[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]40[/td] [td]Rune (t), Blue D'hide (t)[/td] [td]375[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]50[/td] [td]Studded (g), Wizzy (g)[/td] [td]425[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]65[/td] [td]Black (g)[/td] [td]475[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]75[/td] [td]Adamant (g), Green D'hide (g)[/td] [td]550[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]85[/td] [td]God Armours (Saradomin, Guthix, Zamorak)[/td] [td]675[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]90[/td] [td]New God Armours (Bandos, Armadyl)[/td] [td]750[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]95[/td] [td]Gilded[/td] [td]950[/td] [/tr] [/table] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Other Noteworthy Media] [img]http://puu.sh/7UW5W.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UW8g.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UWdw.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UZUU.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7UZYg.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7V041.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7V04Q.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7V0as.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7V0dZ.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7V0hq.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7V0j6.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7V0nf.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7V0qu.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7V0t8.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7V0uC.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
[center] [SPOILER=AllVideos] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lA0V7bYE0K0]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lA0V7bYE0K0[/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sT1SVwrE9eE]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sT1SVwrE9eE[/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Aef6K69Lk9k]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Aef6K69Lk9k[/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ddfAP70c_Dk]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ddfAP70c_Dk[/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RkzTrz5_mVw]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RkzTrz5_mVw[/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LOY7dSTmBaY]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LOY7dSTmBaY[/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jGtp4QKZcP4]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jGtp4QKZcP4[/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f5g0Mfeb5zU]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f5g0Mfeb5zU[/url] [/spoiler]
Thanks for Viewing. :) [img]http://conquest-317.com/images/conquest317.gif[/img][/center]

item.title: | Conquest #317 | Online 24/7 | D&D | Quests |
item.dc:creator: @Solid_snake1 Solid snake
item.description:
@Solid_snake1 wrote:

Well, we just got done adding the New Easter Event for this year, it will be available for the next 3 days (until Monday morning).

The rewards are as follows:
Easter Gloves (randomly heals the player 100HP).
Easter Perk (allows the player for 2 hours, to randomly get Easter Eggs as drops).
500K XP Lamp.

Start this at home by talking to the Easter Bunny.

MAKE SURE TO UPDATE YOUR CLIENT!

Read full topic

item.title: | Conquest #317 | Online 24/7 | D&D | Quests |
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

Recently the staff made the decision to both reset the economy and stats on the server, this server has advanced so much since it's initial release (can be seen in our first YT video) and the items that were obtained easily then were not easily obtain anymore. We felt this was unfair to old players as the XP rate dropped and so did the rates of good drops. This reset allows both old and new players a fresh start at the leaderboard and the economy with the items the get as drops.

Server updated.

Read full topic

item.title: | Conquest #317 | Online 24/7 | D&D | Quests |
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

Latest Update:
A new area has been added! It can be accessed using the Skilling Teleport in your Spell Book.

Warning: This area requires ATLEAST 80 Woodcutting, Fishing, or Mining. Also, you may be assigned a task you can’t complete the objective is to get the required levels for the tasks given at the new area.

There are currently 11 different tasks and I have built a pretty easy to edit system for adding new/editing old tasks. Let us some feedback on the system.

Edit: We now have 18 tasks and a new RuneCrafting altar has been added there as well (Soul Runes) he may request you to get him some of those as well.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f5g0Mfeb5zU&feature=youtu.be

Read full topic

item.title: | Conquest #317 | Online 24/7 | D&D | Quests |
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

[quote=“Ashi, post:80, topic:539321”][quote author=MicroZoft link=topic=658155.msg4403445#msg4403445 date=1391190912]

It just says checking versions. Does not give me prompt to get new version. Does nothing. This is why I think the server is offline. Tried both webclient and downloadable version. Both do nothing.

Go to C/Users/YourAccountName/

and delete the cache (Conquest317)

Then re-run either the Dl client or Webclient. Should work fine then.
[/quote]
I’m using Linux, no C:/ so what do I do? What about if you’re using Mac? To bad your client does not support those operating systems. You just lose a huge chunk of players from compatibility issues.[/quote]

Never really looked into that, will go on making a workable version for both Mac and Linux.

Read full topic
